news.title: AppDB and Developer Docs Update
news.body: Two WineHQ additions appeared this week. If you've aspired to become a Wine hacker, you will appreciate a quick introduction written by Mike Hearn. It's not a replacement for the Wine Developer Guide, but it does serve as a good starting point. Also this week, Chris Morgan and Tony Lambregts modified the AppDB to allow folks to take over an application and become a maintainer. Then you can edit comments, change app descriptions, and all kinds of other good stuff. If there's an app you regularly use under Wine, please consider maintaining an AppDB page and help track regressions. Have any ideas for improving the interface? Let us know!
